did.unittitle: International Brotherhood of Pulp Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers Files on 1921-1926 Strike

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers

did.abstract: Photocopies of meeting minutes and proceedings, correspondence, and other materials relating to the International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers' strike against the International Paper Company from 1921 to 1926.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers, formed in 1909, represented skilled as well as non-skilled workers. It merged with the United Papermakers Paperworkers in 1972, forming the United Paperworkers International Union (UPIU). In 1999, UPIU joined with the Oil, Chemical and Atomic Workers Union to form the Paper, Allied-Industrial, Chemical and Energy Workers International Union (PACE). In 2005, PACE merged with the United Steel Workers of America.

The United Paperworkers International Union was formed in 1972, when the United Papermakers and Paperworkers (1957-1972) merged with the International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers (1909-1972). The United Papermakers and Paperworkers had evolved in 1957 from a merger between the International Brotherhood of Paper Makers (1893-1957) and the United Paperworkers of America (1946-1957).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photocopies of meeting minutes and proceedings, correspondence, and other materials relating to the International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers' strike against the International Paper Company from 1921 to 1926.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers Files on 1921-1926 Strike #5955. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
